datalogTemperatureEnabled.title: Temperature Datalog Enabled
datalogTemperatureEnabled.description: Indicates if temperature datalogging is active

dailyAirQualityEnabled.title: Daily Air Quality Enabled
dailyAirQualityEnabled.description: Indicates if daily air quality data transmission is active

newMeasurementsPerMessage.title: New Measurements per Message
newMeasurementsPerMessage.description: Configuration: Number of new measurements to include in each datalog message

transmissionsOfSameData.title: Transmissions of Same Data
transmissionsOfSameData.description: Configuration: Number of times the same data is repeated for redundancy

transmissionPeriod.title: Transmission Period
transmissionPeriod.description: Configuration: Period for datalog message transmissions

totalMeasurements.title: Total Measurements in Message
totalMeasurements.description: Metadata: Total number of data points in the received datalog message

samplingPeriod.title: Sampling Period
samplingPeriod.description: Metadata: Time between individual measurements in the datalog

repetitionsInMessage.title: Repetitions in Message
repetitionsInMessage.description: Metadata: Number of repetitions of the same data in the received datalog message
